item.title: Your First Step in Cybersecurity: SOC and Certifications
item.author: muratkurkoglu@gmail.com (Murat Kurkoglu)
item.description: If you're wondering how to get into the cybersecurity world, this article is for you. Discover the most common entry-level positions, essential skills, and crucial certifications.
